content: A {{full-stack}} software engineer in training and {{master of late-night coding snacks}}!
Although my focus is on backend, most of my professional experience has been as a {{full-stack}} developer.
I also enjoy programming {{AI Chatbots}} using {{ML Algorithms}}, like {{Trigon}} and integrating it with {{web apps}}.
I am focused on {{learning and gaining expertise}} in {{Cloud technologies}} like {{GCP}}, continuously seeking opportunities to broaden my skill set in this area.
I'm a {{Zealous}} developer, always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn.
